roleset.name: possible, executable

role.descr: whom it is feasible for, who can execute?

example.name: All args, with It extraposition
example.text: I support having IDs to limit voter fraud , but you can not make it difficult and it should be economically feasible for all to get an ID

roleset.note: FEASIBLE-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. (from feasible.01-j)
